recipes.label: Tamper with an Apparatus
recipes.startdescription: These designs have an intended way of working. I have other intentions in in mind. We can accomplish this with discordant Moth or entropic Winter.
recipes.description: These designs have an intended way of working. I have other intentions in in mind. We can accomplish this with discordant Moth or entropic Winter.

slots.description: 器具可用于实现我之目标。

recipes.label: Rust and Rot
recipes.startdescription: All things end. My touch is bitter snow, and after me, only silence. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Bleach and Blister
recipes.startdescription: All things fail. My touch is hatred. After me, there will be a whimper and a whine and then a gurgling rattle of death.  We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Crack and Curdle
recipes.startdescription: All things falter. My touch is cold, my actions calculated. After me this machine will be less than it was. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: The Roads That Chaos Walk
recipes.startdescription: All things ache for change. Strain no more, little ones, we will set you free. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: The Maneuvres of Abbandon
recipes.startdescription: All things yearn to change. Any moment the smallest particles could scatter like a swarm at a slight agitation. And we can be very agitating. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: The Movements of Mischief
recipes.startdescription: All things desire change. The engineer might have dreamt up a great contraption, but it would just as gladly be parts. And gladly we will make it so. We may yet succeed.
